name: Martian Rescue
overview: The Mars mission has failed and the six-man crew are stranded on the planet surface. Your objective is to rescue the crew but the Martian Craft are on standby to thwart your efforts and constant meteors and asteroids plague your rescue plans. Outwit the Saucers and destroy the asteroids and you will succeed in your mission. Otherwise, you will join the brave who went before and failed!
